DataElement.preferredName: Specimen Core Biopsy And Surgery Timespan Day Interval
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of days elapsed between the core biopsy date and surgery date.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Specimen Core Biopsy And Surgery Timespan
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._The removal of a tissue sample using a needle with a relatively large diameter, for microscopic examination._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._The branch of medical science that treats disease or injury by operative procedures._The period of time between two dates or events or between the beginning and end of something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.
